hudson.plugins.analysis.util

Class GitBlamer

  • java.lang.Object
    • hudson.plugins.analysis.util.AbstractBlamer
      • hudson.plugins.analysis.util.GitBlamer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Blamer, Serializable

    public class GitBlamer
extends AbstractBlamer
    Assigns git blames to warnings. Based on the solution by John Gibson, see JENKINS-6748.
    Author:
    Lukas Krose
    See Also:
    Issue 6748, Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • blame

        protected Map<String,BlameRequest> blame(Map<String,BlameRequest> linesOfConflictingFiles)
                                  throws InterruptedException,
                                         IOException
        Description copied from class: AbstractBlamer
        Computes for each conflicting file a BlameRequest. Note that this call is executed on a build agent. I.e., the blamer instance and all transfer objects need to be serializable.
        Specified by:
        blame in class AbstractBlamer
        Parameters:
        linesOfConflictingFiles - a mapping of file names to blame request. Each blame request defines the lines that need to be mapped to an author.
        Returns:
        the same mapping, now filled with blame information
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if this operation has been canceled
        IOException - in case of an error
